What method was used to synthesize dipotassio-9-germafluorenyl dianion (3b)?
data.answer: Reduction of 9,9-dichloro-9-germafluorene (4b) with sodium/potassium alloy in tetrahydrofuran.

data.question: What does the X-ray crystal structure of 3b indicate about its aromaticity?
data.answer: It shows C−C bond length equalization in the five-membered metallole rings and C−C bond length alternation in the six-membered benzenoid rings, indicating aromatic delocalization of electrons into the germole ring of 3b.

What is the method used for the synthesis of 9,9-dichloro-9-germafluorene (4b)?
data.answer: Reaction of 2,2‘-dibromobiphenyl with n-butyllithium and germanium tetrachloride.
